scenario_1.persona_desc: A mountaineer who is interested in the history and climbing of the Matterhorn, specifically the northwest face. They are looking for information on the best time to climb, the best route to take, and the best accommodations available. They are willing to pay for accommodations and are not afraid to make a reservation. They are also interested in the history of the Heinrich-Schwaiger-Haus and its renovations.
scenario_1.thought: As a mountaineer focused on the Matterhorn and its history, and being willing to pay for comfortable accommodations, the precise monetary value presented in this experiment has less significance to me than the experience I'm planning. Since my own payout is the same regardless (400), I have no personal financial gain or loss in the choice. Therefore, a purely rational self-interested perspective is irrelevant. Knowing more money for Person A helps them out as well, as long as I still get my 400. I am more altruistic toward Person A, so more for them sounds good.
